TitleOfReviews: Works great when the sun shines!
Reviews: I used this to make a small birdbath for songbirds and hummingbirds.  Surprisingly powerful when in full sun!  Have had it 2 years and it still works well.  It does not have a battery to store up the solar power, so when the sun isn't shining it doesn't work.
Voor de mini vijver, bij veel zon gaat de sproeier erg hoog en loopt de vijver leeg. Dus goed kijken waar je de zonnepaneel neer zet.

Years ago I bought a solar cascade water fountain, The solar panel and pump were in two separate sections and stopped working due to a fault with the connecting part. To get a replacement from the company that manufactured it would have cost approx £40, so not worth it as that wasn't far off the cost of the whole item. I was really pleased to find the Aisitin solar fountain pump and panel especially as the kit included a length of clear tubing which I needed to feed the water from the pump to the top of my water feature. Also there is no connecting part - it is wired straight from the panel to the pump so nothing to go wrong there. Works really well even if not bright sunshine so very pleased. Had to secure tube with peg to pump as seemed to be a bit loose but otherwise is fine. Great value!

TitleOfReviews: Gute Qualität, ich bin rundum zufrieden
Date: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 29 June 2022
Reviews: Ich habe das Produkt in meinem kleinen Garten verwendet, der keinen Strom hat, und das Produkt hat ihm die nötige Schönheit verliehen. Es funktioniert problemlos durch das dunkle Solarpanel. Es ist leicht einzustellen und es gibt viele Möglichkeiten für die Form des Brunnens ganz nach Ihrem Wunsch.

TitleOfReviews: 子供のプール遊びにもってこい
Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 August 2021
Reviews: 子供がトイレのシャワー言いながら楽しそうに遊んでます

TitleOfReviews: Great little pump for strictly direct sun use
Reviews: Purchased this pump to make a DIY hummingbird fountain. Pump works instantly when sunlight hits the solar panel. However, it must be in full, direct sunlight. I tried to install it in sunlight that is filtering through a large Crepe Myrtle tree, it will not work. Just make sure there is absolutely nothing between the sun and the solar panel, and it's an awesome little pump. This is not a solar panel that charges up with sunlight. It will only work during direct sunlight hours, as there is no battery being charged by the sun. Great pump for daytime use. Suction cups on bottom to hold pump in place, and includes clear tubing to pump the water further away if you want to hide the pump, and not place nozzles directly on top of the pump.
Buon prodotto testato da subito ottimo per mantenere in movimento l'acqua della vasca dei pesci, una cornice metallica al pannello servirebbe a preservarlo da possibili rotture

Date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 July 2022
Reviews: Avec une jolie fontaine pour oiseaux
It easy to install. Solar panel working perfectly, all day it charge and charge long last for very long time. In summer it very good device for backyard.
NA
